item.description:
(copied directly from Social Fun's page!)

PLEASE DO NOT DOUBLE, TRIPLE OR QUADRUPLE RSVP

It's time for another Mix and Mingle cross Meetup Private Party for 160+ members at Kitty O’Shea's (near Faneuil Hall) at 131 State St Boston, MA 02109. Tel. 617-725-0100 Website http://www.kittyosheas.com/boston.asp

Kitty O’Shea's' 2nd floor holds 160 people. We’ll have our own DJ, dance floor, bathrooms, appetizers, bar area, 2 bartenders, etc. so this will truly be a private party. I pre-buy $350 in appetizers (wings, veggie platter, etc.) in advance, since their kitchen is too small to accommodate food for 160 members. Food will be fuller this time, but there will be NO refills on food. A good reason to get there early and enjoy some food while it lasts.

Note: Music will be at medium levels in the main room upstairs and turned off in the back room so members will have a separate area to chat. After 9PM the dancing + loud music starts. Please do not complain, since members come to dance to music after 9PM.

To get in please tell security at the stairs you are with Social Fun to get in (even if you are with a different group).

Go upstairs to meet/greet Biagio, your host for the night. Please introduce yourself, say what group you are with, and have a $5 bill in hand at the top of the stairs (no $1 bills, please). We cannot block the stairs and security will make members to go back downstairs if they take too long.

1. Everyone, but the invited Meetup Group Head Organizers, pays $5 cash.

 2. After 9 p.m. you will have to pay another $5 cover charge to the bar, for a total cost of $10 ($5 to the bar and $5 to reimburse Biagio for renting the 2nd floor).

3. If you get in before 9PM you ONLY have to pay $5 to Biagio.

4. It will be packed. Get there early to ensure you can get in.

5. If you come after 8PM you might not get in right away and you will have to wait in line downstairs

6. Tell security you are with Social Fun to get in - even if you are with a different group. With all that aside, if I have not scared you away, then please join us for all this fun on Friday, starting at 7:30PM till the cows come home.

The Meetup Groups that are invited to come:

Social Fun http://www.meetup.com/SocialFun (Confirmed by Biagio)  

The Boston Volunteer Meetup http://www.bostonvolunteer.org/ (Confirmed by Josh)

Boston Happy Hour http://nightlife.meetup.com/421/ ( Confirmed by Tonya)

Girls just want to have FUN  http://www.meetup.com/FUNgirls/ (Confirmed by Sarah)

The Boston Euro Social Meetup  http://euro.meetup.com/76/ (Confirmed by Noelle)

The World is Our Playground Meetup  http://www.meetup.com/The-World-is-Our-Playground/ (Confirmed by Ralph)

 

We normally have over 150 members at these Mix and Mingle parties. I hope you can all join us for this blast of a party. It should be fun! Ciao, Biagio
item.how_to_find_us: We have the whole 2nd floor of Kitty O'Shea's to ourselves. Look for Biagio at the top of the stairs.
item.name: Boston Mix + Mingle (M&M) for Multiple Meetup Groups
